name: Vi Editor Python Rewrite with TDD

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-arc.title: Design modular architecture for vi editor
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-arc.description:
Design the overall architecture for the vi editor with clear module boundaries:
        - Buffer management module (line storage, cursor)
        - Mode management (command, insert, visual)
        - Command parser and executor
        - File I/O module
        - Display/rendering module
        - Configuration module

        Create architecture document with module interfaces and data flow.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-tes.title: Create file-based test framework
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-tes.description:
Build a test framework that:
        - Reads input_file.txt, actions.txt, expected_output.txt
        - Executes actions against the editor
        - Compares output with expected using diff
        - Provides clear test reports
        - Supports both unit and integration tests

        Framework must be simple, reliable, and extensible.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-buf.title: Create comprehensive buffer management tests
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-buf.description:
Create file-based tests for buffer management:
        - Test empty file handling
        - Test single/multi-line files
        - Test cursor movement boundaries
        - Test line insertion/deletion
        - Test large file handling (1000+ lines)
        - Test special characters and unicode

        Minimum 10 test cases with input/action/expected files.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-buf.title: Implement buffer management module
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-buf.description:
Implement buffer.py module:
        - Line-based text storage
        - Cursor position tracking
        - Line insertion/deletion/modification
        - Efficient memory usage for large files
        - Boundary checking

        All tests from buffer-tests must pass.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-nav.title: Create navigation command tests
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-nav.description:
Create file-based tests for navigation:
        - h,j,k,l movement (left,down,up,right)
        - w,b word movement
        - 0,$ line start/end
        - gg,G file start/end
        - Numbered movements (5j, 10l, etc.)

        Test edge cases: empty lines, file boundaries, word boundaries.
        Minimum 15 test cases.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-nav.title: Implement navigation commands
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-nav.description:
Implement navigation in command_mode.py:
        - Parse movement commands
        - Execute cursor movements
        - Handle numeric prefixes
        - Respect file/line boundaries

        All navigation tests must pass.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-ins.title: Create insert mode tests
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-ins.description:
Create file-based tests for insert mode:
        - i,I insert at cursor/line start
        - a,A append after cursor/line end
        - o,O open line below/above
        - Text insertion and escape
        - Special key handling (backspace, enter)

        Test mode transitions and text insertion.
        Minimum 12 test cases.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-ins.title: Implement insert mode
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-ins.description:
Implement insert_mode.py:
        - Mode transition handlers
        - Character insertion at cursor
        - Special key processing
        - Proper cursor positioning after mode change

        All insert mode tests must pass.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-del.title: Create delete operation tests
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-del.description:
Create file-based tests for deletions:
        - x delete character
        - dd delete line
        - dw delete word
        - d$ delete to line end
        - D delete to line end (alternate)
        - Numbered deletes (3dd, 5x)

        Test edge cases and buffer updates.
        Minimum 10 test cases.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-del.title: Implement delete operations
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-del.description:
Implement delete operations in command_mode.py:
        - Character/word/line deletion
        - Delete with motion commands
        - Numeric repeat handling
        - Buffer cleanup after deletes

        All delete tests must pass.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-yan.title: Create yank and paste tests
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-yan.description:
Create file-based tests for copy/paste:
        - yy yank line
        - yw yank word
        - p,P paste after/before
        - Yanking with counts (3yy)
        - Paste multiple times

        Test register storage and retrieval.
        Minimum 8 test cases.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-yan.title: Implement yank and paste
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-yan.description:
Implement yank/paste in command_mode.py:
        - Yank operations to register
        - Paste from register
        - Register management
        - Line vs character yanks

        All yank/paste tests must pass.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-vis.title: Create visual mode tests
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-vis.description:
Create file-based tests for visual mode:
        - v character-wise selection
        - V line-wise selection
        - Selection with movement
        - Operations on selections (d, y)

        Test selection highlighting and operations.
        Minimum 8 test cases.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-vis.title: Implement visual mode
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-vis.description:
Implement visual_mode.py:
        - Visual mode activation
        - Selection tracking
        - Movement in visual mode
        - Operations on selections

        All visual mode tests must pass.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-und.title: Create undo/redo tests
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-und.description:
Create file-based tests for undo/redo:
        - u undo last change
        - Ctrl-r redo
        - Multiple undo levels
        - Undo after various operations

        Test state management and restoration.
        Minimum 6 test cases.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-und.title: Implement undo/redo system
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-und.description:
Implement undo.py:
        - Command history stack
        - State snapshots
        - Undo/redo operations
        - Memory-efficient storage

        All undo/redo tests must pass.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-sea.title: Create search tests
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-sea.description:
Create file-based tests for search:
        - / forward search
        - ? backward search
        - n,N next/previous match
        - Case sensitivity
        - Regex patterns

        Test wraparound and highlighting.
        Minimum 8 test cases.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-sea.title: Implement search functionality
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-sea.description:
Implement search.py:
        - Pattern search forward/backward
        - Match highlighting
        - Next/previous navigation
        - Basic regex support

        All search tests must pass.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-rep.title: Create replace command tests
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-rep.description:
Create file-based tests for replace:
        - :s/old/new/ single replace
        - :s/old/new/g global replace
        - :%s/old/new/g file-wide replace
        - Regex patterns in replace

        Test various replace scenarios.
        Minimum 6 test cases.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-rep.title: Implement replace commands
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-rep.description:
Implement replace in ex_commands.py:
        - Parse :s commands
        - Pattern matching and replacement
        - Flags (g, i, c)
        - Range support

        All replace tests must pass.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-fil.title: Create file I/O tests
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-fil.description:
Create file-based tests for file operations:
        - :w write file
        - :q quit
        - :wq write and quit
        - :q! force quit
        - :e open file
        - Handle permissions and errors

        Test file creation, modification, saving.
        Minimum 8 test cases.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-fil.title: Implement file I/O operations
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-fil.description:
Implement file_io.py:
        - Read files into buffer
        - Write buffer to file
        - Handle encodings
        - Permission and error handling
        - Backup creation

        All file I/O tests must pass.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-dis.title: Create display and UI tests
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-dis.description:
Create tests for display features:
        - Line numbers display
        - Status bar (mode, file, position)
        - Command line display
        - Screen refresh and scrolling

        Test terminal output formatting.
        Minimum 5 test cases.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-dis.title: Implement display and UI
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-dis.description:
Implement display.py:
        - Terminal control (curses or similar)
        - Screen rendering
        - Status bar updates
        - Line number display
        - Efficient screen updates

        All display tests must pass.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-int.title: Create comprehensive integration tests
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-int.description:
Create end-to-end integration tests:
        - Complete editing sessions
        - Multiple mode transitions
        - Complex command sequences
        - Edge cases and error handling
        - Performance with large files

        Minimum 15 integration test scenarios.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-cli.title: Implement CLI interface
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-cli.description:
Implement main.py CLI:
        - Command-line argument parsing
        - Editor initialization
        - Main event loop
        - Signal handling (Ctrl-C, etc.)
        - Graceful shutdown

        Create executable vi.py script.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-int.title: Verify all integration tests pass
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-int.description:
Run all integration tests:
        - Execute full test suite
        - Verify 100% pass rate
        - Document any limitations
        - Performance benchmarks

        Ensure editor is production-ready.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-doc.title: Create user and developer documentation
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-doc.description:
Create comprehensive documentation:
        - User manual with command reference
        - Developer guide with architecture
        - Test writing guide
        - Installation instructions
        - Known limitations

        Documentation in markdown format.

9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-pol.title: Final polish and optimization
9d16c244-42ba-4ce9-91bc-cb928c869e75-pol.description:
Final improvements:
        - Code cleanup and refactoring
        - Performance optimizations
        - Error message improvements
        - Edge case handling
        - Code review and quality checks

        Ensure professional quality.
